title: Tasks to be completed for a Beta Release
author: joubertdj
body_snippet:
Dear mRemoteNG Community / Kvarkas,

Looking at the issues and the commits that have been occuring recently I am optimistic about the future of mRemoteNG.
However, one thing I think the mRemoteNG community needs is a kind of "ToDo" list that we need to be able to tackle so that we can get to a semi-Beta state release.

@Kvarkas : With a better plan and/or "ToDo" list the community can support you better. I am sure we could rally around such a "ToDo". Hell, most of us have AI agents anyway, so we...
